mapper.select: SELECT class_id, grade, class_name FROM class_info WHERE department_id = #{courseDep} AND grade = #{classGrade} AND class_name = #{className}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( user_id, user_password, permission_id, user_name, birth_date, sex, email, phone, department_id, class_id, admission_date, sticker ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userId}, 3, #{userName}, #{birthDate}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{courseDep}, #{classId}, #{admissionDate}, #{sticker} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_name = #{userName}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, department_id = #{courseDep}, class_id = #{classId}, sticker = #{sticker} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
